name: Sealife Safari
description: Single Player, HD (High Definition). Photograph the sparkling personalities of 60 fascinating fish and explore 5 unique deep sea destinations. Take your picture-taking skills to the next level by creating memorable photo albums! The fun never stops as you uncover secret routes, discover hidden items and encounter special fish appearances.  Unlock the full game now for an adventure the whole family can enjoy! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
